pullRequest.title: reserve disk space early in build
pullRequest.bodyText:
create a 200MB file and then remove it to reduce allocating writes during pipeline
Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant lmsurpre@us.ibm.com

commit.message:
reserve disk space early in build

create a 200MB file and then remove it to reduce allocating writes during pipeline

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    dd if=/dev/urandom of=balloon.dat bs=1024k count=200
          
          
            
                    dd if=/dev/urandom oflag=direct of=balloon.dat bs=1024k count=200
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,6 +123,14 @@ jobs:
       uses: joschi/setup-jdk@v1
       with:
         java-version: ${{ matrix.java }}
+    - name: free disk space
+      run: |
+        # create and remove a 200 MB file to make sure we have the room needed later
+        dd if=/dev/urandom of=balloon.dat bs=1024k count=200

     - name: free disk space

commit.message:
add oflag=direct and move directly before SIT

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

add docker system prune

instead of rmi

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

create and delete 200MB file as part of server start

yet another attempt to avoid extremely slow server starts on the CI

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>
